body_html:
That's odd, I just ran it and it worked fine for me. @ajeetksingh can you make sure that you aren't running anything else on the GPU at the same time? And it's normal for it to use the full memory.

My output below:

step 0, training accuracy 0.14
step 100, training accuracy 0.76
step 200, training accuracy 0.9
step 300, training accuracy 0.82
...
step 19700, training accuracy 1
step 19800, training accuracy 1
step 19900, training accuracy 1
test accuracy 0.9932

body:
That's odd, I just ran it and it worked fine for me. @ajeetksingh can you make sure that you aren't running anything else on the GPU at the same time? And it's normal for it to use the full memory.

My output below:

```
step 0, training accuracy 0.14
step 100, training accuracy 0.76
step 200, training accuracy 0.9
step 300, training accuracy 0.82
...
step 19700, training accuracy 1
step 19800, training accuracy 1
step 19900, training accuracy 1
test accuracy 0.9932
```
